title: parama pAvanamu
sahitya:
parama pAvanamu nI smaraNamani niratamu niSkAmamugA nammiti


anupallavi

  narula darikirAni vEnamEmO narula bAdha tIrppavEmO ayinA 


caraNam 1    pApa karamulakE paikamu shApArhulakE sarva saukhyamu 
patitulakE paripAlanamu matihInulakE yOgamu ayinA
    caraNam 2    kaliyugamaNTE kaTuvAgItalO palikina dantAvaTTi rAtalO 
salalita muraLI gItamE nAlO nindinadE cAlI janmalO
